answerText: Monte Carlo methods[10] Monte Carlo methods can be used to carry out numerical versions of this operation. The "definite" version of this operation finds the area bounded by a curve.

subject: Science
question: Question: Gibbs sampling is one of these algorithms that uses Markov chains to get a series of observations from a specified multivariate probability distribution.  [10] Name this class of computational methods which generate numerical approximations through repeated random sampling.
